TextLibrary.Text: Syrus, you poor fool. You came alone.
Syrus, you poor fool. You came alone.
Syrus, you poor fool. You came alone.
Syrus, you poor fool. You came alone.
Liandra, I beg of you... come back to Ylarie with me. Perhaps the Elven Mages have a cure.
Liandra, I beg of you... come back to Ylarie with me. Perhaps the Elven Mages have a cure.
Liandra, I beg of you... come back to Ylarie with me. Perhaps the Elven Mages have a cure.
Liandra, I beg of you... come back to Ylarie with me. Perhaps the Elven Mages have a cure.
Don't you understand, Syrus? I don't want a cure. I want power. And I want YOU. You belong to me - you are mine - even if I must take you by force.
Don't you understand, Syrus? I don't want a cure. I want power. And I want YOU. You belong to me - you are mine - even if I must take you by force.
Don't you understand, Syrus? I don't want a cure. I want power. And I want YOU. You belong to me - you are mine - even if I must take you by force.
Don't you understand, Syrus? I don't want a cure. I want power. And I want YOU. You belong to me - you are mine - even if I must take you by force.
I am no fool, Liandra. I did not come alone.
I am no fool, Liandra. I did not come alone.
I am no fool, Liandra. I did not come alone.
I am no fool, Liandra. I did not come alone.
